agosm Changelog
-----------------

v1.00
 - Leaflet updated to v1.0.2
 - Cumtom markers in subform
v1.0.4
 - leaflet 1.3.1 (18.01.2018) http://leafletjs.com/download.html
 - esri leaflet geocoder v2.2.8 (https://github.com/Esri/esri-leaflet-geocoder/releases)
 - esri leaflet v2.1.2 (https://github.com/Esri/esri-leaflet/releases)
 - leaflet routing machine 3.2.7 https://github.com/perliedman/leaflet-routing-machine/releases
 - leaflet control geocoder 1.5.8 https://github.com/perliedman/leaflet-control-geocoder/releases
v1.0.9
  - Koordinates picker - changed zoom
v1.0.10
  - https if possible
